New York Foundation For the Arts (NYFA) Records
Subseries I. New York-Israel Cultural Cooperation Commission
Subseries I. New York-Israel Cultural Cooperation Commission

This subseries contain meeting minutes and notes, memorandum, and correspondence created by the New York-Israel Cultural Cooperation Commission. The bulk of the subseries consists of applications for the NYICCC grant for fiscal sponsorship of individual artists and organizations. There are also applications for cultural missions to Israel.

The New York-Israel Cultural Cooperation Commission was a series of grant programs for fiscal sponsorship of projects and cultural missions to Israel with funds being dispersed by NYFA. The program was meant to foster cooperation between Israel and the people of NYC.
